Package org.echo.mobile.framework.model.socketoperations

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AccessSocketOperation
    Represents blockchain call for access to blockchain apis
    AccountBalancesSocketOperation
    This function fetches all relevant class Account objects for the given accounts, and subscribes to updates to the given accounts. If any of the strings in nameOrId cannot be tied to an account, that input will be ignored. All other accounts will be retrieved and subscribed.
    BlockDataSocketOperation
    Returns the block chainâ€™s rapidly-changing properties. The returned object contains information that changes every block interval such as the head block number, the next witness, etc.
    CancelAllSubscriptionsSocketOperation
    Stop receiving any notifications. This unsubscribes from all subscribed markets and objects.
    CustomOperation<T>
    Represents operation data for custom call to blockchain API
    CustomSocketOperation<T>
    Represents custom call operation to blockchain API
    FullAccountsSocketOperation
    This function fetches all relevant class Account objects for the given accounts, and subscribes to updates to the given accounts. If any of the strings in namesOrIds cannot be tied to an account, that input will be ignored. All other accounts will be retrieved and subscribed.
    GetAccountDepositsSocketOperation
    Retrieves ethereum deposits by accountId
    GetAccountHistorySocketOperation
    Get operations relevant to the specified account.
    GetAccountWithdrawalsSocketOperation
    Retrieves ethereum withdrawals by accountId
    GetAssetsSocketOperation
    Get a list of assets by id.
    GetBlockSocketOperation
    Retrieve a full, signed block.
    GetChainIdSocketOperation
    Get the chain id.
    GetContractLogsSocketOperation
    Retrieves emitted logs of contract
    GetContractResultSocketOperation
    Retrieves result of called contract operation
    GetContractSocketOperation
    Retrieves full information about contract.
    GetContractsSocketOperation
    Retrieves information about selected contracts.
    GetEthereumAddressSocketOperation
    Retrieves ethereum address for required account
    GetGlobalPropertiesSocketOperation
    Get blockchain current global properties object
    GetKeyReferencesSocketOperation
    This function fetches all relevant class Account objects for the given public keys.
    GetObjectsSocketOperation<T extends GrapheneObject>
    Get the objects corresponding to the provided IDs. If any of the provided IDs does not map to an object, a null variant is returned in its position.
    ListAssetsSocketOperation
    Get a list of assets by symbol
    LoginSocketOperation
    Represents blockchain call for access to blockchain
    LookupAssetsSymbolsSocketOperation
    Get a list of assets by symbol
    QueryContractSocketOperation
    Calls contract operation without chaining blockchain state. Retrieves constant information.
    RegisterSocketOperation
    Register account on blockchain node with credentials
    RequiredContractFeesSocketOperation
    Represents blockchain call. Returns list of fees required for contract call
    RequiredFeesSocketOperation
    Represents blockchain call. Returns list of class AssetAmount for operations
    SetSubscribeCallbackSocketOperation
    Register global subscription callback to object. Every notification initiated by the full node will carry a particular id as defined by the user with the identifier parameter.
    SocketOperation<T>
    Represents blockchain call Source
    SubscribeContractLogsSocketOperation
    Register subscription callback to contract logs. Every notification initiated by the full node will carry a particular id as defined by the user with the identifier parameter.
    SubscribeContractsSocketOperation
    Register subscription callback to contracts changes (history or object changes). Every notification initiated by the full node will carry a particular id as defined by the user with the identifier parameter.
    TransactionSocketOperation
    Broadcast a transaction to the network. The transaction will be checked for validity in the local database prior to broadcasting. If it fails to apply locally, an error will be thrown and the transaction will not be broadcast.
    TransactionWithCallbackSocketOperation
    Broadcast a transaction to the network. The transaction will be checked for validity in the local database prior to broadcasting. If it fails to apply locally, an error will be thrown and the transaction will not be broadcast.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AccessSocketOperationType
    Type of operation for access to blockchain
    OperationCodingKeys
    Keys for json creation of blockchain call
    SocketMethodType
    Method type for call to blockchain
    SocketOperationKeys
    Represents blockchain operations by keys
